text: Sasha Maslov Photography Veterans - Sunao Tsuboi Retrieved August 31, 2015 was a Japanese anti-nuclear and anti-war activist. He was a survivor of the atomic bombing of Hiroshima. He was the co-chair of Nihon Hidankyo, a Japan-wide organisation of atomic and hydrogen bomb sufferers.Nihon Hidankyo website About Us Retrieved August 31, 2015 In 2011 he was awarded the Kiyoshi Tanimoto peace prize."Thinking about Peace" Experience Counts Hiroshima Peace Memorial Museum Retrieved September 1, 2015 Tsuboi died on October 24, 2021 in Hiroshima at the age of 96.Sunao Tsuboi, A-bomb survivor who met Obama in Hiroshima, dies at 96 ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Japanese school teachers Category:Japanese anti-nuclear activists Category:People from Hiroshima
